def search(x, seq):

        return 0
    for i, elem in enumerate(seq):
        if x < elem:  # If x is less than the current element, insert before it
            seq.insert(i, x)
            return i
    seq.append(x)  # If we've reached the end of the sequence, append x to the end
    return len(seq)

# Sample Testcase

    left_index = 0

    left_sorted = sort_age(left)
    right_sorted = sort_age(right)
    return merge(left_sorted, right_sorted)
